data.Name: Jawbox
data.Bio: Jawbox is a post-hardcore band from Washington, D.C., United States. Its original members were J. Robbins (vocals, guitar), Kim Coletta (bass guitar) and Adam Wade (drums). Bill Barbot (vocals, guitar) later came on board and Zach Barocas (drums) joined the group replacing Wade. 1989–1997, 2009, 2019–present Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Jawbox
data.Description: Doors 7:00 PM Show 8:00 PM This Show is ALL AGES All support acts and times subject to change The Event Organizer is requiring that all attendees of this event must be fully vaccinated against COVID-19. You certify and attest that you and all individuals in your party attending the event will abide by the following regulations: All fans must be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 (at least two weeks after final dose) and provide proof of vaccination - either the original vaccination card or a printed copy of the vaccination card. These regulations will apply to all members of your party before they are allowed to entry to the event and to any users of the tickets purchased by you.
